words.def: a challenge to do something dangerous or foolhardy
a unit of absorbed ionizing radiation equal to 100 ergs per gram of irradiated material
a unit of surface area equal to 100 square meters
the sense organ for hearing and equilibrium
a period marked by distinctive character or reckoned from a fixed point or event
a public promotion of some product or service
a colorless and odorless inert gas
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
